structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases
Justices Of The Peace, Notaries Public And Commissioners

law.catch_line: Acting As Justice Or Notary After Expiration Of Commission; Penalty
law.text: Whoever presumes to act as a justice of the peace or notary public after the expiration of his commission, and after receiving notice of such expiration, shall be punished by a fine of not less than one hundred nor more than five hundred dollars.
